A poem (by way of elegie) upon Mr Stephen Colledge, vulgarly known by the name of the Protestant joyner.
1 sheet (2 p.).
printed for J. Bowen, London : 1681.
Caption title. Verse: "Ah Colledge! how relentless is thy fate,". Reproduction of original in the British Library.
